sentences.english: Elixirs are concentrated alcohol extractions that are similar to both teas and tinctures .
sentences.chinese: 长生不老药是浓缩的酒精萃取物，类似于茶和酊剂。

sentences.english: One can make tinctures from the teas as well and here is a simple formula for this.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以从药茶中自制酊剂，下面是一个简单配方。

sentences.english: Strain and pour into cleaned tincture bottles .
sentences.chinese: 压紧并倒入干净的酊剂瓶。

sentences.english: This 2-part formula includes vegetable capsules and a tincture.
sentences.chinese: 这2部分公式包括植物胶囊和酊剂。

sentences.english: There are also tinctures available on-line as well as through local heath food stores.
sentences.chinese: 通过本地健康食品商店也可以买到即时可用的酊剂。

sentences.english: Herbal tinctures can be made from teas containing the herb in a dried form.
sentences.chinese: 药草酊剂可以由包含干药草的茶来制成。

sentences.english: These herbs can be taken in the form of capsule, tea or tincture.
sentences.chinese: 这些草药可以采取的形式胶囊剂，茶或酊剂。

sentences.english: I recently began co-creating mushroom tinctures along with the mushroom kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 最近，我开始和蘑菇王国一起共同创造蘑菇酊剂。

definition: to take medicine orally (as opposed to applying externally)
